title: DoodleBoard
description: A collaborative whiteboard app for real-time drawing and brainstorming. Built with Next.js, Node.js, and WebSockets for live updates. Features secure rooms, drawing tools, and a clean UI.

title: MemoBrain
description: A resource organizer for saving and sharing links, docs, tweets, and videos. Built with Next.js, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and Docker. Public sharing with no login required.

title: Civio
description: A Framer Community template made with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and TypeScript. Features smooth animations, custom 404, and responsive layout.

title: Milestone X
description: A responsive web app built in a day using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Mobile-first design with animations. Based on a Framer template and deployed on Vercel.
